title: Officer Vi - Art vs Model ( take sunglasses off with taunt?)
body:
https://66.media.tumblr.com/9ced8469fcc244a9565b6fe98086b853/tumblr_o7qychQ7RA1ub715ho1_1280.jpg
On the art Vi has a beautiful face. I don't know why the splash art shows her face while the model has sunglasses on, but could it be possible make the model take off the glasses just like neon strike vi? The price could not increase, because Neon Strike Vi is also a 975 RP skin.

replies.body: But then she wont be wearing them to reduce the damage from the sun!
{{champion:89}} Burn you heretic, PRAISE THE SUN!!!!!

#**YOU DARE CLAIM ME TO BE A HERETIC?!?**

I AM

#**EMBERTINE!!**

I HAVE BEEN MAINING THE SUN FOR NEAR ALL MY LEAGUE CAREER FOR NEARLY FIVE YEARS!

Who are you to dare claim me a heretic?

https://i.imgflip.com/13n6we.jpg
No true worshiper of the sun would wear such heretical eyewear.

You are wrong good sir!

For Leona to wear sunglasses is her training to see past the darkness and behold the glory of the sun!

No matter how darkening the glasses may be, she will always see the sun!

_"Hope shines brightest in the dark_
_Where nothing's ever seen,_
_Lighting undiscovered places_
_No one's ever been!"_

https://scontent.cdninstagram.com/hphotos-xaf1/t51.2885-15/s320x320/e15/11324233_482706165221451_177353059_n.jpg
while this is a nice idea i think the glasses in officer vi is a lot less noticeable than neon strike vi
I honestly never even noticed she had them on.
I want them taken off honestly....

> [{quoted}](name=iKnightmare,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=k5GRTrfX,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2016-05-25T22:07:16.824+0000)
>
> TAKE IT ALL OFF!
> 
> {{sticker:zombie-nunu-hearts}}

Right there with yah...
She has sunglasses on? Never noticed.
